Title: Allows an impeachment proceeding to proceed after the resignation of a person from public office and prohibits such person from holding a future public office
Summary: Allows an impeachment proceeding to proceed after the resignation of a person from public office; prohibits such person from holding a future public office.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 24 of article 6 of the constitution, in relation to allowing an impeachment proceeding to proceed after the resignation of a person from public office and prohibits such person from holding a future public office
